And <WG1161> when<WG3752> I arrive<WG3854>, whomsoever3739, 1437 ye shall approve<WG1381>, them<WG5128> will I send<WG3992> with<WG1223> letters<WG1992> to carry<WG667> your<WG5216> bounty<WG5485> unto<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2419>:
